thread.title: Sirivennela Seetarama Sastry's lyrics highlight in Kanche's audio
thread.title_full: Sirivennela Seetarama Sastry's lyrics highlight in Kanche's audio - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sirivennela Seetarama Sastry's lyrics highlight in Kanche's audio
text: The audio album of the upcoming period drama 'Kanche' is out and Bollywood music director, Chirantan Bhatt has composed several interesting tunes which have become quite popular. The main highlight of this situational album are the soulful lyrics penned by Sirivennela Seetarama Sastry. They have given life to all the melodies and elevated the film to another level. Slated for an October 2nd release, Kanche has Pragya Jaiswal playing the lead opposite Varun Tej.
